trans-unit.source: Provides command related utility methods that register <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> objects for class owners and commands, add and remove command event handlers, and provides services for querying the status of a command.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce metodi di utilità correlati ai comandi che registrano oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> per i proprietari delle classi e i comandi, aggiungono e rimuovono gestori eventi dei comandi e fornisce servizi per la ricerca dello stato di un comando.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> is responsible for managing routed commands.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> è responsabile della gestione dei comandi indirizzati.

trans-unit.source: For more information about commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui comandi, vedere [panoramica dei comandi](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A> to register a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A> per registrare un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> a una classe anziché un'istanza.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> to register an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> per registrare un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> a una classe anziché un'istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> method forces the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> metodo forza il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> per generare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event informs a command source to query the command it is associated with to determine whether or not the command can execute.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento indica un comando di origine per eseguire il comando è associato per determinare se il comando è possibile eseguire una query.

trans-unit.source: The element to attach <c>handler</c> to.
The can execute handler.
Attaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> to the specified element.

The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and attaches them to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> which is a command source for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> e associarli a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> che è un comando di origine per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.source: First, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is created and associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: Prima di tutto, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> viene creato e associato il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.source: Next, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> are created.

And finally, the handlers are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Infine, i gestori sono associati ai <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The element to attach <c>handler</c> to.
The executed handler.
Attaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> to the specified element.

The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and attaches them to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> which is a command source for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> e associarli a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> che è un comando di origine per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.target: Prima di tutto, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> viene creato e associato il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

And finally, the handlers are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Infine, i gestori sono associati ai <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.

The element to attach <c>handler</c> to.
The can execute handler.
Attaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> to the specified element.

The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and attaches them to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> which is a command source for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.

trans-unit.target: Prima di tutto, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> viene creato e associato il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The element to attach <c>handler</c> to.
The can execute handler.
Attaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> to the specified element.

The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and attaches them to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> which is a command source for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> e associarli a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> che è un comando di origine per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.source: First, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is created and associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: Prima di tutto, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> viene creato e associato il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.source: Next, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> are created.

Finally, the handlers are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Infine, i gestori vengono associati per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute" /> attached event.
Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed" /> attached event.
Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> to raise the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested" /> event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> only pays attention to certain conditions in determining when the command target has changed, such as change in keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> presta attenzione solo a determinate condizioni per determinare se la destinazione del comando è modificata, ad esempio modifica nello stato attivo della tastiera.

trans-unit.source: In situations where the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> does not sufficiently determine a change in conditions that cause a command to not be able to execute, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> can be called to force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: In situazioni in cui il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> non è sufficientemente determina una modifica nelle condizioni che causano un comando che non sia in grado di eseguire, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> può essere chiamato per forzare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> per generare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> to periodically call <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> to force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene utilizzato un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> per chiamare periodicamente <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> per forzare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> per generare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> evento.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute" /> attached event.
Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted" /> attached event.
The class with which to register <c>commandBinding</c>.
The command binding to register.
Registers a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Registra un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> con il tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method enables a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to be associated with a class instead than an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente una <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> da associare a una classe invece che a un'istanza di una classe.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="commandBinding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The type to register <c>inputBinding</c> with.
The input binding to register.
Registers the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Registra l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> specificato con il tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method enables an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to be associated with a type instead of an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> da associare a un tipo invece di un'istanza di una classe.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="inputBinding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
The can execute handler.
Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.

The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene scollegato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> che aveva in precedenza associato a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
The executed handler.
Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.

The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene scollegato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> che aveva in precedenza associato a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
The can execute handler.
Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.

The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene scollegato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> che aveva in precedenza associato a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
The executed handler.
Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.

The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene scollegato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> che aveva in precedenza associato a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> detects conditions that might change the ability of a command to execute.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> rileva condizioni che potrebbero modificare la possibilità di esecuzione di un comando.

trans-unit.source: This event holds onto the handler as a weak reference.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento contiene il gestore come un riferimento debole.

trans-unit.source: Objects that listen for this event should keep a strong reference to their event handler to avoid it being garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti che sono in attesa per questo evento è consigliabile mantenere un riferimento sicuro al gestore eventi per evitare che venga raccolto nel garbage collector.

trans-unit.source: This can be accomplished by having a private field and assigning the handler as the value before or after attaching to this event.
trans-unit.target: Questo può essere eseguito con un campo privato e assegnando il gestore come valore prima o dopo aver collegato a questo evento.
